text: On skazal: "Narod moy! Ty vidish': yesli ya opirayus' na yasnoye ukazaniye Gospoda moyego i On dostavil mne ot sebya khoroshiy dostatok: to mne kak ne zhelat' uderzhat' vas ot togo, otchego On vas uklonyayet? YA zhelayu tol'ko ispravleniya, skol'ko mogu: pomoshch' mne tol'ko ot Boga; na Nego nadeyus', i k Nemu s sokrushennym chuvstvom obrashchayus'
